meanings.definition: A type of fried dough pastry typically dusted with powdered sugar.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious zeppoli at the fair.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells zeppoli every Saturday morning.
meanings.sent3: The zeppoli looked like fluffy clouds covered in sugar.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a zeppoli.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly fried zeppoli filled the room.
